name: saas-template
description: SaaS Template with React frontend and Vercel BFF

scripts.dev:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cypress run"
scripts.test:e2e:open: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cypress open"
